questions.quote: Okay! Ho-ho! We did not steal your thunder because we are not getting back together!
Through the magic of sight! I was here, putting our child to sleep...
Who cares?! You went behind my back! I would never do that to you!
I can't believe Rachel just moved on and didn't say anything to me.
Y'know what? He didn't want to talk to us about being angry, well maybe we don't talk to him at all!
Oy. Look, I've been through a divorce, trust me you're gonna be fine. You just can't see it now because you haven't had any closure.
All right! All right! Enough! Enough! Enough!! Enough! You two go home! I-I-I gotta talk to Janine!
Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!
Ohh, it's gonna be so great! I'm gonna get to help decide what we sell, I'm gonna have an office with walls and everything. I'm gonna have walls!
You say 'Thank you very much,' and then you buy me something pretty. Come on, we're gonna put are hands in this bowl, and we're gonna start squishing the tomatoes.
